name: My First Horse: Adventures on Seahorse Island
name_original: My First Horse: Adventures on Seahorse Island
description:
"My first horse" is also my first official game, I am a solo developer that has tried to realizing my nieces dream to get her own horse game. Now 3,5 years later, she's not so into horses anymore :-) So, I hope you and your children will enjoy this game instead!

I hope this project will inspire others to chase their dreams, no matter how daunting they may seem at first.

Love
/Peter
